Package curam.util.common.path

Provides the base for path resolver plug-ins.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Path
    A path represents a series of steps that identify some data.
    PathResolver
    An interface that describes the features of path resolvers that are responsible for locating the data identified by a path.
    Step
    A step is a component of a Path.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataAccessor
    A data accessor that wraps a collection of path resolver containers with their configured plug-ins and implements the PathResolver interface to provide access to data.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataAccessException
    Exception type used when accessing data using path resolver plug-ins.
    DataAccessSecurityException
    Exception type used when data access fails due to insufficient access privileges.

Package curam.util.common.path Description

Provides the base for path resolver plug-ins.
